name: WeShare Network
tag_list: business, articles, blog, social, forums, group, network
overview:
WeShare Network is a place for friends family and businesses. You can create groups of any size, blogs, articles, job postings, classifieds, events, chat, forums and stores.

WeShare Network was created because of some of the missing key features in many of the largest networks online. Many of the current social or group networks have made navigation a bit complicated.

There have been issues with privacy changes among other privacy conflicts. Many people have been searching for a better more simple way to control their privacy settings. We wanted an environment where people could search within categories to find products, information from stores, forums and blogs. Employers have a section for job postings and advertisement for their businesses.

As WeShare Network grows the benefits within will continue to always bring more interesting and useful features. We wanted to create an environment where everyone could come and have the ability to socialize with family and friends or promote themselves or their business. WeShare Network was created with easy navigation and usability in mind. WeShare Network does not track, rent or sell any personal information.

With WeShare Network you can create groups for friends, family, special interests, and more. You can separate family from business by creating or joining groups with different interests.

You also have the ability to create blogs, articles, events, group chat, forums, job postings, advertise, and create classifieds. Weshare Network has the ability to e-mail or IM internally. As WeShare will grow there will be added features that are very useful in the personal and business environments.

You also have the ability to create a store front and shop the stores within WeShare Network with your personal shopping cart. All of these features and many more were created to be easy to use with simple navigation.

At WeShare we will continue to better the WeShare experience for the people that join the Weshare Network.

Join and invite the planet…
